questions.question: During dinner at the ranch, Carmen blamed a curse for causing ______________.

choices.answer: the stillborn young of all the livestock on the ranch
an increase of vermin contaminating food and water supply
a mysterious illness affecting her mother, Frida Martinez
the shortage of rain on the Mtz property the last few years

questions.question: In the kitchen, why did Vanessa scream and grab a knife?

choices.answer: She thought Izel was transforming into a beast
She saw a face with vacant eyes appear in the window
She felt scaly hands with sharp claws suddenly grab her
She was left gasping for air when huge wings smothered her

questions.question: Carmen became alarmed when she learned that during a storm, her ____________.

choices.answer: cousin had been riding beyond the boundaries of the ranch
goat had been untied & was swept away by the flood
brother took Vanessa to a house where the Shaman once lived
father had risked his life by fighting a pack of wild dogs

questions.question: What happened as Vanessa waited for the others outside the Mummy Museum?

choices.answer: The ranch hand asked if he could buy her crystal necklace.
A masked performer with red eyes tried to lead her away
She was surprised by the sudden appearance of Xolo.
A girl pressed a long, gray tooth into her hand.

questions.question: While Izel prepared dinner, what did she tell Vanessa about Frida?

choices.answer: Cesar had disputed ownership of the ranch
She had adopted Armado from a Nahua woman
Don Miguel, her dad, hadn't forgiven her after she ran away.
The shaman had cursed her

questions.question: Vanessa considered leaving Mexico after she ___________.

choices.answer: saw Amigo lying dead with a puncture wound on his neck
was ordered by Frida to stay away from her son
heard gunshots and thought Xolo had been put down
was accused of trespassing on sacred ground

questions.question: Why was Vanessa convinced someone had been in her room?

choices.answer: The shrunken head she treasured had pins stuck into it.
A dead frog and some snakeskin were inside her backpack.
Pages about the Chupacabra were missing from her mom's file.
A stone with a hole in the middle was left on the dresser.

questions.question: What happened after Vanessa encountered the Chupacabra?

choices.answer: Izel took her to a Nahua village to speak with the shaman
She found herself alone & crying in the  the derelict house.
Armado woke her to insist she clean off the dried blood.
Frida appeared out of nowhere with Amigo.

questions.question: When Armado and Vanessa followed Xolo to a forestead area, they found ___________.

choices.answer: wolves locked in cages and concealed by branches
an animal skin made to resemble the Chupacabra
animal carcasses and evidence of a hunters' camp
human bones buried in a shallow grave

questions.question: What did Vanessa realize when she went to Pablo's house with Frida?

choices.answer: He was a government scientist investigating the Chupacabra
He was the Nahua leader who believed the ranch was theirs.
He was the lost son Don Miguel had told Frida about.
He had been in love with Frida all his life & sought revenge
